manifest.description: Music League Strategist codebase manifest - comprehensive file metadata for AI-assisted development

changes: Analyzed 72 source files across stores, services, components, API, and config
Documented all exports, dependencies, and integrations

stores.description: Zustand state management stores with localStorage persistence

files.name: musicLeagueStore.ts
files.description: Main application state store managing themes, sessions, songs across a 4-tier funnel system (pick->finalists->semifinalists->candidates), user profiles, preferences, and competitor analysis

state.description: Manages multi-theme funnel system, sessions, user profile, Songs I Like collection, competitor analysis

files.notes: Core store with complex tier management. Tracks song promotion history. Supports server sync with normalization.

files.name: settingsStore.ts
files.description: Settings store managing API keys and service configurations (OpenRouter, Spotify, YouTube Music, ntfy notifications) with localStorage persistence and env variable defaults

state.description: API keys and service configurations with env fallbacks

files.name: modelsStore.ts
files.description: AI model registry store managing user's list of OpenRouter models with nicknames, favorites, cost tiers, and sorting. Seeds with default models on first load.

state.description: User's AI model registry with nicknames and preferences

files.notes: Seeds 6 default models on first load: Claude Sonnet 4, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, GPT-4o, Gemini 2.0 Flash, Claude 3 Haiku, DeepSeek V3

files.name: musicLeague.ts
files.description: Core type definitions for the entire Music League Strategist domain: songs, themes, sessions, funnel system, AI responses, user profiles, competitor analysis, and system prompts

interfaces.name: Song
interfaces.description: A song with metadata, Spotify/YouTube links, AI reasoning, user ratings, and funnel position

interfaces.name: MusicLeagueTheme
interfaces.description: A Music League round with 4-tier funnel (pick/finalists/semifinalists/candidates)

interfaces.name: MusicLeagueSession
interfaces.description: A brainstorming session linked to a theme with working candidates and conversation history

interfaces.name: AIConversationResponse
interfaces.description: Structured AI response with candidates, message, extracted preferences, tier actions

files.notes: Contains massive AI system prompts (MUSIC_LEAGUE_PROMPTS). Defines tier limits (30/8/4/1). Special AI actions: create_playlist, enter_finalists, finalize_pick, save_to_liked.

files.name: chat.ts
files.description: OpenRouter chat API types for messages, requests, streaming chunks, and reasoning support
files.notes: StreamChunk supports reasoning models (o1, DeepSeek, GLM-4) with separate reasoning/content streams.

files.name: models.ts
files.description: AI model metadata types with cost tiers, provider extraction, and OpenRouter API response shapes

services.description: External API integrations and business logic services

files.name: api.ts
files.description: API client for PostgreSQL backend. Handles all CRUD operations for themes, sessions, songs, user profile, saved songs, competitor analysis, settings, and migration.
files.notes: All endpoints use /api/ml base path. Used by useServerSync hook for data persistence.

files.name: openrouter.ts
files.description: OpenRouter API service for AI chat completions with streaming support and reasoning model handling
files.notes: Singleton service. Handles SSE streaming with manual buffer parsing.

files.name: spotify.ts
files.description: Spotify API service for OAuth token refresh, track search, playlist CRUD, and cross-platform link resolution via Songlink API. Supports smart playlist syncing.
files.notes: Token auto-refresh with 60s buffer. Songlink proxied through nginx to avoid CORS.

files.name: youtubeMusic.ts
files.description: YouTube Music API service for OAuth token refresh, video search, and playlist creation using YouTube Data API v3

files.name: csvImport.ts
files.description: Music League CSV import parser. Processes 4 CSV files (rounds, submissions, competitors, votes) to build competitor profiles, round rankings, and analytics.
files.notes: Custom CSV parser handles quoted commas and escaped quotes.

files.name: ntfy.ts
files.description: ntfy push notification service for deadline reminders and phase milestones.
files.notes: Priority escalation based on hours remaining.

files.name: useServerSync.ts
files.description: React hook for PostgreSQL server synchronization. Handles initial load, localStorage migration detection, and provides helper hooks for syncing individual entities.
files.notes: Uses useRef to prevent double-initialization. Normalizes arrays on server data load.

files.name: MusicLeagueStrategist.tsx
files.description: Main application component that combines chat interface, funnel visualization, song details, and all panels into the primary UI
features: AI chat interface with message history
Parse and process AI song suggestions
files.notes: Core component that orchestrates the entire application.

files.name: FunnelVisualization.tsx
files.description: 4-tier funnel visualization showing candidates -> semifinalists -> finalists -> pick with drag-and-drop, song cards, and tier management

files.name: SongDetailSlideout.tsx
files.description: Slideout panel showing detailed song information including embedded Spotify/YouTube players, metadata, and tier management actions

files.name: ThemeSelector.tsx
files.description: Dropdown selector for managing themes with create, select, and delete operations

files.name: SessionManager.tsx
files.description: Tabbed interface for managing chat sessions within a theme, with create, switch, and delete operations

files.name: PlaylistSyncPanel.tsx
files.description: Panel for syncing songs between the app and Spotify/YouTube playlists with bi-directional sync capabilities

files.name: SettingsModal.tsx
files.description: Modal dialog for configuring API keys, OAuth credentials, and app settings

files.name: ModelsManager.tsx
files.description: Dropdown selector for choosing the AI model to use for chat interactions

files.name: CompetitorAnalysisPanel.tsx
files.description: Panel for viewing imported competitor data and round analysis from Music League CSV exports

files.name: SongsILikePanel.tsx
files.description: Panel for managing a personal library of favorite songs that can be referenced for AI suggestions
features: Add songs via Spotify URL or manual entry

files.name: CSVImportModal.tsx
files.description: Modal for importing competitor data from CSV files exported from Music League

files.name: DeadlineIndicator.tsx
files.description: Visual indicator showing time remaining until submission and voting deadlines with color-coded urgency

files.name: PhaseProgressBar.tsx
files.description: Visual progress indicator showing the current phase of the Music League round (submission, voting, results)

files.name: HelpModal.tsx
files.description: Modal displaying comprehensive help documentation, keyboard shortcuts, and feature explanations

files.name: YouTubePopoutModal.tsx
files.description: Modal with embedded YouTube player for playing songs in a larger popout window

ui-primitives.description: shadcn/ui primitive components based on Radix UI

api.description: Express.js backend API with PostgreSQL database

files.name: index.js
files.description: Express.js REST API server that provides backend for Music League Strategist with PostgreSQL database integration
files.notes: Auto-initializes PostgreSQL schema on startup. Port defaults to 3001.

files.name: docker-compose.yml
files.description: Orchestrates 3-service stack: PostgreSQL, Node API, and Nginx frontend

files.name: Dockerfile (API)
files.description: Multi-stage Docker build for API service using Node 20 Alpine

files.name: Dockerfile (Frontend)
files.description: Production Nginx container serving pre-built Vite app

files.name: deploy.yml
files.description: GitHub Actions workflow for deploying to Raspberry Pi via self-hosted runner
files.notes: Triggers on main branch push. Copies to /home/dietpi/music-league-strategist.

files.name: vite.config.ts
files.description: Vite build configuration with React plugin and path aliasing

files.name: tailwind.config.js
files.description: Tailwind CSS configuration with shadcn/ui design tokens and dark mode

files.name: tsconfig.json
files.description: TypeScript root config with project references

files.name: tsconfig.app.json
files.description: TypeScript config for React app code

files.name: tsconfig.node.json
files.description: TypeScript config for Node.js build tooling

files.name: package.json
files.description: Frontend package configuration with React 19, Vite, Zustand

files.name: api/package.json
files.description: API package configuration with ES modules enabled

files.name: postcss.config.js
files.description: PostCSS configuration for Tailwind CSS and Autoprefixer

files.name: eslint.config.js
files.description: ESLint flat config with TypeScript and React rules

files.name: components.json
files.description: shadcn/ui CLI configuration for component generation

files.name: App.tsx
files.description: Root React component handling server sync, migration UI, and main app layout
files.notes: Manages 3 states: loading, migration needed, main app.

files.name: main.tsx
files.description: React entry point with StrictMode

files.name: utils.ts
files.description: Utility function for merging Tailwind classes with proper precedence

files.name: index.css
files.description: Global styles with Tailwind directives, CSS variables for theming, and custom scrollbar styles

files.name: README.md
files.description: Main project README covering features, installation, deployment, and API configuration

files.name: feature-plan.md
files.description: Implementation plan for 8 major features including AI commands, deadline tracking, and competitor analysis
files.notes: Historical planning document - most features now implemented

files.name: gemini-research-openrouter-models.md
files.description: Research analysis of OpenRouter AI model providers for music recommendation use cases
